title: Unspecified error, please check logs.
body: I was trying to update league of legends, and its not working, it always stops at 5% or some random percentage and then says the error message. I'm pretty new to the game so im not sure what to do.

replies.body:
Try launching the client from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your installation directory:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)**

Please let me know if this was unable to cause a change. Let me know if you see any failures after 32% in the patching process as well.
